name: colorLeds[i].off()
content:
Turns the specified colorLED off.

This method works just like `led.off()` and will turn whichever LED is specified off. You can turn the colorLED back on with `colorLeds[i].on()`.

examples.name: Alternating Lights
Alternating Lights with For Loops
examples.description: Does the same thing as the previous Alternating Lights example, but this time uses for loops.
